video.title: The Vampire Diaries
video.synopsis: Trapped in adolescent bodies, feuding vampire brothers Stefan and Damon vie for the affection of captivating teenager Elena.

episodes.synopsis: Reeling from the death of her parents, 17-year-old Elena becomes interested in a handsome new student named Stefan, who's hiding a dark secret.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Elena goes to the Salvatore house to talk to Stefan but finds Damon there instead. Damon reveals surprising information about Stefan's past.
episodes.title: The Night of the Comet

episodes.synopsis: Elena invites Stefan and Bonnie to dinner, hoping the two will bond, but the evening is disrupted by the unexpected arrival of Damon and Caroline.
episodes.title: Friday Night Bites

episodes.synopsis: Stefan escorts Elena to the town's Founder's Party. Damon tells Elena a story about the Salvatores, leaving her with questions Stefan won't answer.
episodes.title: Family Ties

episodes.synopsis: Stefan is hopeful about his plan to get rid of Damon and decides to reveal parts of his past to Elena. Bonnie seeks advice from her grandmother.
episodes.title: You're Undead to Me

episodes.synopsis: Stefan reveals to Elena the Salvatore family history and how his rivalry with Damon began. In the present, Damon takes control of Vicki's future.
episodes.title: Lost Girls

episodes.synopsis: Bonnie's abilities surprise Damon. Elena asks Jeremy not to see Vicki. Matt takes Vicki to a haunted house, but the night takes a terrifying turn.
episodes.title: Haunted

episodes.synopsis: Stefan gets a surprise birthday visit from old friend Lexi. Caroline tries to get Damon's medallion back from Bonnie.
episodes.title: 162 Candles

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy gets a break from the mysterious new history teacher, Alaric Saltzman. Damon tells Stefan the stunning reason he returned to Mystic Falls.
episodes.title: History Repeating

episodes.synopsis: When Sheriff Forbes tells Damon about another attack, he offers to track down the killer, learning startling information about the town's founders.
episodes.title: The Turning Point

episodes.synopsis: Damon goes to Georgia to surprise an old flame, Bree, and enlist her help. Meanwhile, Stefan uncovers a startling clue to the past.
episodes.title: Bloodlines

episodes.synopsis: Ben of the Mystic Grill comes to Bonnie's aid. Damon and Stefan take Elena to a school dance with a 1950s theme. Alaric introduces himself to Damon.
episodes.title: Unpleasantville

episodes.synopsis: More Salvatore family secrets are revealed by Damon and Stefan's father, Giuseppe. Bonnie's date with Ben takes a bad turn.
episodes.title: Children of the Damned

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy asks Anna to a party in the woods. Stefan, Damon and Elena work with Bonnie and Grams to open the tomb and are shocked by what they find.
episodes.title: Fool Me Once

episodes.synopsis: Damon is asked by Sheriff Forbes to be part of a fundraising bachelor auction.
episodes.title: A Few Good Men

episodes.synopsis: Anna brings a surprising guest to pay a visit to Damon. Elena and Stefan go on an awkward double date with Caroline and Matt.
episodes.title: There Goes the Neighborhood

episodes.synopsis: Stefan is forced into a frightening decision. Matt is hopeful his mom will stay. After Caroline's car breaks down, she makes a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Let the Right One In

episodes.synopsis: Stefan displays a rare party attitude. Damon's attempt to find out why Elena's uncle, John Gilbert, has returned to town takes an ugly turn.
episodes.title: Under Control

episodes.synopsis: Elena and Caroline compete in a beauty pageant. Spencer Locke appears as one of the contestants. John Gilbert tries to scare Damon.
episodes.title: Miss Mystic Falls

episodes.synopsis: Elena learns what happened when Damon and Stefan were turned. Pearl has an ugly confrontation with John Gilbert. Jeremy and Anna get closer.
episodes.title: Blood Brothers

episodes.synopsis: Isobel returns to town and stuns Alaric with her attitude and her demands that he arrange a meeting with Elena.
episodes.title: Isobel

episodes.synopsis: Damon and Alaric try to stop John Gilbert from setting a plan in motion to bring Founder's Day to an end amid chaos, destruction and death.
episodes.title: Founder's Day

episodes.synopsis: Elena arrives home to a nightmare. Damon is the first to realize that Katherine has returned.
episodes.title: The Return

episodes.synopsis: When a confused and desperate Caroline leaves the hospital and joins her friends at the Mystic Falls Carnival, Damon wants to take immediate action.
episodes.title: Brave New World

episodes.synopsis: Elena, Damon and Alaric go to Duke University to search through Isobel's research, hoping to uncover any clues surrounding the Lockwood family.
episodes.title: Bad Moon Rising

episodes.synopsis: Stefan is shocked when Katherine reveals new secrets about what really happened in 1864. Damon tries a new tactic to resolve his issues with Mason.
episodes.title: Memory Lane

episodes.synopsis: Tyler learns more about the Lockwood family curse from Mason, and Sheriff Lockwood receives startling information.
episodes.title: Kill or Be Killed

episodes.synopsis: Katherine chooses a new victim. Bonnie discovers new information about Mason and shares it with Stefan.
episodes.title: Plan B

episodes.synopsis: Stefan and Damon decide on a new plan to deal with Katherine at the masquerade ball. Things take an ugly turn when Matt and Tyler start doing shots.
episodes.title: Masquerade

episodes.synopsis: Stefan and Damon come to Elena's assistance and, in the process, learn surprising new information.
episodes.title: Rose

episodes.synopsis: Elena puts herself in a dangerous position searching for the truth about Katherine's past.
episodes.title: Katerina

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy's reckless attempt to help Bonnie lands him in a life-threatening position and forces Stefan to put himself in danger.
episodes.title: The Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: As the full moon nears, Caroline helps Tyler prepare for transformation. Damon and Alaric are suspicious when a stranger shows up looking for Mason.
episodes.title: By the Light of the Moon

episodes.synopsis: While Damon tries to get the truth out of Jules, he asks Elena to keep an eye on Rose, a situation that turns unexpectedly dangerous.
episodes.title: The Descent

episodes.synopsis: Johnathan Gilbert's return to Mystic Falls is an unhappy surprise to Elena, Jenna and Damon. Stefan does his best to reach out to a confused Tyler.
episodes.title: Daddy Issues

episodes.synopsis: Stefan and Elena attempt a romantic weekend getaway, not realizing that they've been followed. Damon attends a tea at the Historical Society.
episodes.title: Crying Wolf

episodes.synopsis: Stefan tells Elena about his darkest days. Trying to catch Elijah off guard, Damon arranges a dinner party for him with Jenna, Alaric and Andie.
episodes.title: The Dinner Party

episodes.synopsis: Stefan and Bonnie try to convince Jonas and Luka that they should all be working together, but Jonas's lack of trust leads to a violent confrontation.
episodes.title: The House Guest

episodes.synopsis: Elena and Alaric lash out at John when Isobel's unexpected arrival leaves Jenna devastated. Stefan and Damon realize they have a new secret weapon.
episodes.title: Know Thy Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Elena receives disturbing messages from Klaus. Expecting him to show up at the 1960s Decade Dance, Damon and Alaric attend as chaperones.
episodes.title: The Last Dance

episodes.synopsis: Klaus is revealed and Elena learns shocking news about his motives. Plus, flashbacks to 1491 reveal Katherine's introduction to Elijah and Klaus.
episodes.title: Klaus

episodes.synopsis: Damon is willing to go to great lengths to prevent Elena from being a victim of Klaus's plan to break the curse, putting him at odds with Stefan.
episodes.title: The Last Day

episodes.synopsis: As the full moon arrives, Elena prepares for whatever Klaus has planned and Tyler faces his second transformation.
episodes.title: The Sun Also Rises

episodes.synopsis: More than one life hangs in the balance as the consequences of the sacrifice ritual play out to a horrifying conclusion.
episodes.title: As I Lay Dying

episodes.synopsis: It's Elena's 18th birthday, and as she searches for Stefan, Damon tries to keep her from doing anything that might draw Klaus's attention.
episodes.title: The Birthday

episodes.synopsis: Damon and Alaric reluctantly go along with Elena's new strategy to find Stefan, leading Damon into a dangerous fight with an unexpected enemy.
episodes.title: The Hybrid

episodes.synopsis: Stefan reunites with a vampire from decades earlier. In a flashback to the 1920s, he comes face-to-face with a shocking chapter from his wild past.
episodes.title: The End of the Affair

episodes.synopsis: A frustrating new enemy pushes Damon over the edge, and his outburst has lasting consequences. Bonnie's strange encounter affects everyone.
episodes.title: Disturbing Behavior

episodes.synopsis: A traditional Senior Prank Night before the school year begins takes a deadly turn.
episodes.title: The Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: As senior year begins, Elena, Caroline, Bonnie and Matt are reeling from recent events, while Stefan carries out his latest assignment from Klaus.
episodes.title: Smells Like Teen Spirit

episodes.synopsis: Preparing to celebrate Illumination Night, Mystic Falls is invaded by spirits. After an encounter with an angry spirit, Damon asks Bonnie for help.
episodes.title: Ghost World

episodes.synopsis: Elena and Rebekah engage in a power struggle, until Rebekah reveals some of her family's ancient secrets and the violent past she shares with Klaus.
episodes.title: Ordinary People

episodes.synopsis: On the night of the homecoming dance, Rebekah tells Elena why the evening is so important to her, leaving Elena with conflicting emotions.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Klaus uses violence to convince Damon and Elena that no one will be safe until he finds Stefan and gets his family back.
episodes.title: The New Deal

episodes.synopsis: Elena, Bonnie and Matt surprise Caroline with a small party for her 18th birthday. Tyler refuses to go along with Klaus's latest demand.
episodes.title: Our Town

episodes.synopsis: Bonnie's recurring dreams about Klaus's coffins lead her to a reunion with her mother, Abby, whom Bonnie hasn't seen in 15 years.
episodes.title: The Ties That Bind

episodes.synopsis: Sheriff Forbes delivers disturbing news to Alaric and Elena about a recent murder weapon. Caroline is heartbroken when she's unable to stop a tragedy.
episodes.title: Bringing Out the Dead

episodes.synopsis: Elena is invited to a formal ball at Klaus's mansion and discovers a horrifying and deadly plan. Who can she trust with her new information?
episodes.title: Dangerous Liaisons

episodes.synopsis: When Elijah gives Damon and Stefan a dangerous ultimatum that puts Elena in danger, they turn to Alaric and Meredith for help.
episodes.title: All My Children

episodes.synopsis: Present-day murders in Mystic Falls remind Damon of a similar crime spree a century earlier. Flashing back to 1912, he recalls a beautiful vampire.
Damon is surprised to learn why Sage has returned, and pleased when she devises an unusual method to help him figure out what Rebekah is up to.
episodes.title: Break On Through

episodes.synopsis: Stefan's emotional turmoil leads him to a dangerous confrontation with Klaus and, later, to a heartbreaking moment with Elena.
episodes.title: The Murder of One

episodes.synopsis: Caroline is thrilled when Tyler returns to town, but Tyler soon suspects that something has been going on between Caroline and Klaus.
episodes.title: Heart of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: The 1920s Decade Dance takes a deadly turn when Damon and Stefan realize they need Matt, Jeremy and Bonnie's help to undo a devastating spell.
episodes.title: Do Not Go Gentle

episodes.synopsis: Klaus attempts to leave town with Elena but finds resistance from a surprising new enemy. Damon and Stefan have a candid talk about the future.
episodes.title: Before Sunset

episodes.synopsis: To protect his sister, Jeremy makes a decision that will change everything. Bonnie makes a secret deal with heartbreaking consequences.
episodes.title: The Departed

episodes.synopsis: In the Season 4 premiere, Elena awakens on the morning after the accident to find the thing that she dreaded most has come true.
episodes.title: Growing Pains

episodes.synopsis: Elena tries to cope with the extreme highs and lows that are part of becoming a vampire, as Stefan and Damon argue about what is best for her.
episodes.title: Memorial

episodes.synopsis: Connor continues his search to uncover the secrets of Mystic Falls. Damon and Klaus question Connor, but the confrontation takes a lethal turn.
episodes.title: The Rager

episodes.synopsis: Damon, Elena and Bonnie visit Whitmore College, where Prof. Shane is taking over the occult studies classes formerly taught by Bonnie's grandmother.
episodes.title: The Five

episodes.synopsis: Stefan and Klaus form an uneasy alliance to try and contain the danger that Connor has unleashed. Connor takes Jeremy, Matt and April hostage.
episodes.title: The Killer

episodes.synopsis: Terrifying hallucinations leave Elena shaken and confused. After giving Stefan disturbing news about Elena, Klaus takes matters into his own hands.
episodes.title: We All Go a Little Mad Sometimes

episodes.synopsis: Caroline does her best to be there for Stefan and Elena during a tough time. Damon tries to convince Stefan to help him uncover Prof. Shane's motives.
episodes.title: My Brother's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: Investigating a suspicion about Elena, Damon and Stefan visit New Orleans to see if they can find anyone who remembers their last visit in 1942.
episodes.title: We'll Always Have Bourbon Street

episodes.synopsis: As a winter-themed party fills the streets of Mystic Falls, Stefan and Caroline are at odds with Tyler over his plans for Klaus and his hybrids.
episodes.title: O Come, All Ye Faithful

episodes.synopsis: Appearing unexpectedly at Mystic Falls High, Rebekah tries to force Stefan, Elena and Caroline to answer her questions about the search for a cure.
episodes.title: After School Special

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy is furious when Klaus tries to control him by putting Matt's life in danger. Damon coaches Jeremy as he prepares to take on Klaus's new vamps.
episodes.title: Catch Me If You Can

episodes.synopsis: After confronting her father, Mayor Hopkins, over his unconventional approach to ending the violence in Mystic Falls, Bonnie has a run-in with Kol.
episodes.title: A View to a Kill

episodes.synopsis: Shane leads an expedition to a desolate island off the coast of Nova Scotia, where he believes the secret of the cure lies hidden.
episodes.title: Into the Wild

episodes.synopsis: On the island, Damon has an ugly run-in with a hunter. Stefan confesses his true feelings about the possibility of becoming human again to Elena.
episodes.title: Down the Rabbit Hole

episodes.synopsis: When Stefan returns to Mystic Falls with Elena and Jeremy, Caroline is worried about Elena's state of mind. Stefan reaches out to Dr. Fell for help.
episodes.title: Stand By Me

episodes.synopsis: Elena's new outlook has everyone concerned, leading Stefan and Damon to agree that going back to a school routine is the best thing for her.
episodes.title: Bring It On

episodes.synopsis: Realizing that Elena needs some time away from Mystic Falls, Damon takes her to New York City, where he lived and partied hard in the 1970s.
episodes.title: Because the Night

episodes.synopsis: Elena and Rebekah search for Katherine and find themselves in a Pennsylvania town, where Elena has a surprising encounter with an old acquaintance.
episodes.title: American Gothic

episodes.synopsis: Elijah proposes a life-changing challenge for Rebekah. Caroline finds that her plans for the perfect prom night are disrupted by Elena.
episodes.title: Pictures of You

episodes.synopsis: Acting on a mysterious tip that a plot is brewing against him in New Orleans, Klaus makes a trip to the town he and his family helped build.
episodes.title: The Originals

episodes.synopsis: Damon and Stefan try to provoke Elena into turning her humanity back on, and Caroline is frustrated when her attempt to intervene backfires.
episodes.title: She's Come Undone

episodes.synopsis: As graduation approaches, Caroline tries to distract Elena by focusing on simple tasks, but Elena won't be swayed from her new obsession.
episodes.title: The Walking Dead

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, it's Graduation Day, and the town is overrun with ghosts intent on settling scores and fulfilling their supernatural destinies.
episodes.title: Graduation

episodes.synopsis: Elena is thrilled to move into the dorm at nearby Whitmore College with Caroline as her roommate, thinking that Bonnie will soon join them.
episodes.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer

episodes.synopsis: Without telling Elena that Stefan is missing, Damon gets help finding his brother. Elena and Caroline investigate the cover-up of a campus murder.
episodes.title: True Lies

episodes.synopsis: When Elena and Katherine have the same dream that Stefan is in danger and desperately needs their help, they convince Damon to help them find Stefan.
episodes.title: Original Sin

episodes.synopsis: While Mystic Falls observes its traditional Remembrance Day to honor the dead, Damon and Elena try to help Stefan through a confusing time.
episodes.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls

episodes.synopsis: On campus, Elena is touched by a sad and secretive student. Elena and Damon attend a historical ball dressed as Anne Boleyn and Henry VIII.
episodes.title: Monster's Ball

episodes.synopsis: Silas announces his new goal to Damon and Elena, but they are skeptical when he promises to accomplish one important task in return for their help.
episodes.title: Handle With Care

episodes.synopsis: While Elena and Damon try to explain Amara's situation to Stefan, Dr. Wes Maxfield gives Katherine some deeply disturbing news.
episodes.title: Death and the Maiden

episodes.synopsis: At Whitmore College, Elena and Caroline decide to throw a big party, but their plans are interrupted when Jesse suddenly needs Caroline's help.
episodes.title: Dead Man on Campus

episodes.synopsis: Stefan continues to offer Katherine his support while trying to mask his own pain, until Caroline shows up with an unusual form of therapy.
episodes.title: The Cell

episodes.synopsis: Damon realizes Elena is in danger and enlists Stefan's help to find her. Damon shocks Stefan by revealing his firsthand knowledge of Aaron's family.
episodes.title: Fifty Shades of Grayson

episodes.synopsis: As she faces a new crisis, Katherine remembers the traumatic night in 1490 when she gave birth to the daughter who was immediately taken from her.
episodes.title: 500 Years of Solitude

episodes.synopsis: When Enzo brings Damon a gruesome present and insists that they bond by committing an act of revenge, Damon makes an effort to do the honorable thing.
episodes.title: The Devil Inside

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to help everyone move past recent events, Caroline convinces Elena and Bonnie to attend Whitmore's "Bitter Ball" for broken-hearted students.
episodes.title: Total Eclipse of the Heart

episodes.synopsis: As Damon's behavior escalates from destructive to deadly, Stefan regrets their last conversation and decides to track down Damon and intervene.
episodes.title: No Exit

episodes.synopsis: While Nadia remembers her centuries-long search for her mother, Stefan, Caroline and Matt come up with a desperate new plan to save Elena's life.
episodes.title: Gone Girl

episodes.synopsis: When Stefan tries to explain recent events to a sick Elena, her first instinct is to call Damon. Damon dreads making a disturbing confession to Elena.
episodes.title: While You Were Sleeping

episodes.synopsis: In order to keep Stefan from being harmed by Sloan and the Travelers, Caroline and Enzo go to Atlanta to find a newly discovered doppelgänger.
episodes.title: Rescue Me

episodes.synopsis: Stefan and Elena dream of an unsettling alternate version of the life they might have had together. Bonnie has a disturbing encounter with Grams.
episodes.title: Resident Evil

episodes.synopsis: Stefan tries to distract Elena from obsessing about her relationship with Damon, while Bonnie tries to be realistic about changes on the Other Side.
episodes.title: Man on Fire

episodes.synopsis: Markos's plan to break the witches' curse puts Stefan and Elena in imminent danger, and Damon suggests they hide out in a remote cabin.
episodes.title: What Lies Beneath

episodes.synopsis: Stefan and Elena escape from Markos's control, only to find themselves stranded in a remote location. Damon tries to set a trap for Markos.
episodes.title: Promised Land

episodes.synopsis: Heartbroken by an unexpected tragedy, Damon is focused on holding himself together while pushing Bonnie to stop the disintegration of the Other Side.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: As a new season begins, Elena starts her sophomore year, and Caroline obsesses about reversing the spell cast on Mystic Falls.
episodes.title: I'll Remember

episodes.synopsis: Alaric helps Elena process her grief, Caroline makes a shocking discovery about Stefan, and an enigmatic new girl arrives in Mystic Falls.
episodes.title: Yellow Ledbetter

episodes.synopsis: Elena tries to introduce Caroline and Liam, Stefan detects a strange change in Elena, and Jeremy learns a secret about the antimagic spell.
episodes.title: Welcome to Paradise

episodes.synopsis: Damon relives a dark day as he and Bonnie labor to find their way back to the other side. Stefan helps Elena reinvent herself and start anew.
episodes.title: Black Hole Sun

episodes.synopsis: A homecoming party at a corn maze disintegrates into turmoil with a terrible accident. Tyler's werewolf curse poses a perilous challenge.
episodes.title: The World has Turned and Left Me Here

episodes.synopsis: Alaric recruits help when he can't control Jo. Caroline tries to free Enzo from Tripp's clutches, and Damon's return forces Elena to make a choice.
episodes.title: The More You Ignore Me, the Closer I Get

episodes.synopsis: Elena must confront her dark past. Damon makes a discovery that offers hope. Sheriff Forbes finds herself embroiled in a treacherous scheme.
episodes.title: Do You Remember the First Time?

episodes.synopsis: Elena gets good news when she and Caroline host a celebration at the dorm. Luke and Liv uncover worrisome information about the coven's intentions.
episodes.title: Fade into You

episodes.synopsis: Matt reacts when Enzo steps out of line. Damon's plan backfires when he tries to involve Alaric without his consent. Kai poses an increasing threat.
episodes.title: I Alone

episodes.synopsis: Bonnie waxes nostalgic about happier days. Caroline receives a cheerful surprise at college. When Jo vanishes, Alaric seeks help from Elena and Damon.
episodes.title: Christmas Through Your Eyes

episodes.synopsis: Kai kidnaps Elena as he learns to control his new powers. While Jo readies for the merge ceremony with Kai, Caroline and Stefan search for a cure.
episodes.title: Woke Up with a Monster

episodes.synopsis: Complications build around the merge ceremony and threaten to explode. Caroline is dealt a crushing blow, and Sheriff Forbes fights for her life.
episodes.title: Prayer for the Dying

episodes.synopsis: Elena's plan to celebrate Bonnie's birthday takes an ominous turn. Enzo recruits Matt to intervene in Sarah's life, and Jeremy considers an exit plan.
episodes.title: The Day I Tried to Live

episodes.synopsis: While Jeremy reminisces with a soon-to-be-gone Elena, Stefan helps Caroline arrange her mother's last days. Enzo draws Sarah and Matt into harm's way.
episodes.title: Stay

episodes.synopsis: Elena notices a change in Caroline in the wake of her mother's death. Tyler and Matt reconsider their life choices, and Kai turns to Jo for help.
episodes.title: Let Her Go

episodes.synopsis: Caroline delivers an ultimatum, and Stefan's deed triggers a perilous chain reaction. Damon gets sobering news, and Sarah stirs Enzo's emotions.
episodes.title: The Downward Spiral

episodes.synopsis: Elena helps Damon try to free his mom from a 1903 prison world. Damon is rattled by Bonnie's gift. Enzo and Alaric's plan to sway Caroline backfires.
episodes.title: A Bird in a Gilded Cage

episodes.synopsis: Caroline and Stefan lose their humanity and create mayhem on campus, as Damon gambles on a plan to stop them. A karaoke outing hits a discordant note.
episodes.title: I Never Could Love Like That

episodes.synopsis: Damon must decide if he should reveal vital information to Elena. Bonnie makes an upsetting discovery. Enzo learns the truth about his conversion.
episodes.title: Because

episodes.synopsis: While Alaric and Jo attend their bachelor and bachelorette parties, Elena considers Damon's offer, and Lily spirals downward.
episodes.title: I'd Leave My Happy Home for You

episodes.synopsis: As Elena and Bonnie hustle to help Jo prepare for her wedding, Stefan offers Damon relationship advice. Matt agrees to protect Bonnie from Lily.
episodes.title: I'll Wed You in the Golden Summertime

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected guest puts Elena's life at risk. When Matt flees, Bonnie tries to take control of her own fate. Damon grapples with a critical decision.
episodes.title: I'm Thinking of You All the While
